body:
I've been so inactive, oh my. o-o

Anyways, I'm going to be doing a Q&A video. Feel free to ask me anything, and I mean anything. I'll answer the questions in a video next Saturday.

Post away!

replies.body: How much longer until 50 Shades of Solstice is published?

replies.body:
Already released. Coming to a theatre near you ;)

The big opening for the "Shades of Solstice" had the top rated movie critic come and tell everyone what the movie is about and gave feedback. Very Inspirational and motivating. Here is the link.  Use code "Solstice" to get 20% off tickets

replies.body:
• Are you acrophobic? (Afraid of heights)
  • Are you coulrophobic? (Afraid of clowns)
  • Are you enochlophobic? (Afraid of crowds)
  • Are you pediophobic? (Afraid of dolls)
  • Are you ophthalmophobic? (Afraid of being stared at)
  • Are you trypanophobic? (Afraid of needles)
  • Are you taphophoblic? (Afraid of being buried alive)
Lel srry, I know it's a lot.

replies.body:
Hello Frozen, We meet again...
1. Would you ever answer any questions that I ask of you?
2. If you could choose between watching my content and jumping in a pool of dead fish which would you choose?
3. Would you rather slam your own fingers in your door or get your wisdom teeth pulled out?
4. Who's the best player on Avicus?
5. Who's the hottest/best on the Media team?
6. Can the Media Team Muzz? Yes we're awesome...
7. If you could choose between livestreaming Avicus for 24 hours or livestreaming CS:GO for 24 hours which would you choose?

Choose carefully young one. Let's get right into the noose! (Dramaalert Quote)
